111.content:
You have only known Harry for a few weeks, you didn't really know him actually. You never had a real conversation with him. Harry seemed to be forever barefoot when he was in the common room, sometimes he would go into the bedrooms and use a lock spell on the door. One day you were studying in your bed for a exam when you heard footsteps, someone was walking upstairs. great, you thought someone to distract you further from competing your homework. You glance at the door to see who it was, it was Harry. You said hi to be polite, you tried to turn round to look at him, but found you could barely hold your thoughts without your eyes slowly moving down to look at his feet. He just smiled in reply anyway, so you went back to studying, you heard him cast a spell and everything turned red.

"What's going on?" you shouted, it took you a second to realise what happened, Everything was bigger! You stared up to see a giant blacked haired boy lifting his foot. "H..Harry? What happened?" you asked. Harry walked over to his bed and you followed. "A few weeks ago" Harry's giant voice started to explain, you sat on his foot, you must of been only an inch tall."I found a shrinking spell, walkin around barefoot my feet can get really dirty" Harry wriggles his toes "so I sometimes shrink people and make the clean my feet!" You knew what he was going to say next and sure enough it came "I want you to clean my feet" Harry laughed, "eew NO" you shouted defiantly, you didn't want to touch his soles let alone lick them. "I think you don't understand. I could smoosh you at any second, under my big smelly sole" Harry reminded him. You were still defiant and ran for the door, "wrong move short-guy" Harry shouted and ran after you, he easily caught up with you. Seeing the giant loom over you made you trip, you were now on your back, You saw the god-size giant lift his foot. You could see all the dirt on his sole, know to survive you will have to lick it off. "one more chance..." the giant boomed and lowered his foot, a few centimetres away from you. Knowing your fate if you didn't agree you got to your feet and put your tongue to his big toe "Good boy" Your new god boomed and pick you up. He took you to his bed, Harry laid down and put you at his feet, he then crossed his legs and told you to continue licking.

After a while you actually started to enjoy it. Harry's soles tasted really nice, You had almost finished cleaning the no longer dirty soles when Harry sat up and inspected your work "hmmm...well done" Harry said with an impressed look on his face "I might make you a permanent foot cleaner" you crawled over to his feet and kissed them "and you know your place" Harry said, then an idea came to him. You've known Harry ever since you two first met at Diagon alley 7 years ago. As soon as Harry told you he wasnt returning to Hogwarts last year you've been insistent to come with him in search of horcruxes. Although he said no at first eventually he let you come too.

All of you had been walking for hours, it was now 6:00 pm and hermione finally said they should set-up their tent in a grassy field. As soon as the tent was up Harry fell onto a comfy chair inside, while Hermione and you laid down on the beds. You couldnt help but stare as Harry dug himself deeping into the chair and crossed his legs on the floor. He was wearing a pair of really-old-looking and trashed brown trainers. The soles were covered in dirt and you were sure you could see a small hole on the side of them.

A few hours passed. Hermione fell asleep after re-reading 'tales of beedle the bard'
You and Harry were still awake though, in silence, until Harry sat up. "Ugh." he grunted, you sat up and glanced down at his trainers again. "My feet are really aching today." Harry continued, he wriggled his trainer around. The worn-out holey trainer teased you as it wafted through the air. Harry doesn't normally complain so they must of been aching bad.
You lean over the bed, "Do you want me to rub them?" You offered maybe a little to eagerly because Harry looked at you weirdly, it took a second for Harry to think "Okay... If you're sure you want to" Harry said, still a little unsure. You walk over and sit at Harry's feet. This was great, you think to yourself. Their a million times better than any of oaur of feet youve smelt- and his socks arent even off yet! You try to sneakily draw in deep breaths, "Well?" Harry says, "I thought you wanted to give me a foot rub."
You look up at him, "Do you want your socks on or..."
"Keep them on, I bet the smell is bad enough as it is for you." he says, slightly embarrassed. "Yeah..." You say, pretending it's not the best smell ever. But one day you were going to your next class when you noticed they were walking towards you, smiling, you try to walk the other way but they catch you "were you going? We not scary are we" said Fred or maybe it was George "well you're ugly enough to be scary" said the other red head to his twin "I need to get to class" you say trying to get away as soon as possible. "but we have to test something" they said together and dragged you to the unused boys bathroom were they set up a shop. You notice them lock the door, this isn't the sort of place you would go to, you're not one for dungbmbs or fever fudge. The twins quickly ran over to you and said not to worry. One of them lowered you onto the floor, you tried to get back up be he almost instantly lifted his shoe on to you. Half your vision was now covered by the trashed old school shoe. The weasley twin was heavy and you found it hard to breath "plea...please get off" it was hard to talk as he pushed his weight down onto your chest, and the other twin wasn't helping as you saw him take off one of his shoes and walk over he smirjed then stuck his socked foot in your face! You couldn't believe it the smell was unbearable. He rubbed the sock around your face and stopped when your nose delved into one of the dirty holes that covered the twins sock. You tried to mumble and beg to get up but both the twins laughed as your eyes began to water. You continued to struggle; to the twins amusement. Every now and again the twin with his sock off would again rub his smelly dirty sock around your face, he used his toes to force your mouth open and you let out a mumbled yell as he wriggled his socked toes around your mouth.
"come on Fred he's had enough." The twin with his shoes on finally said, he must if been George. George stepped off of you and Fred put his shoe back on. You were dazed by the sheerstench if Fred's socks long enough to let George quickly duck down and sit on your chest, he then forced your mouth open, this made you more worried, what did they want from you? Fred looked for something in his cloak. He then found it, it was a small orange gob stopper. Fred knelt down and placed it in your mouth, he laughed when he noticed how scared you looked "Swallow." he said "or you get my foot again" Fred smirked. You shook your head, so Fred playfully rubbed some dirt from his shoe onto your face ... With some hesitation you swallowed. Almost instantaneously everything went black.
14.title: Fred and George Weasly

choices: We go for a jog with our dirtiest socks?"
142.content:
You open you're eyes, you can't see a thing but a familiar scent wafts through you're nose making you almost want to be sick. "were am I? HELP" you're shouts were in vain though. You try running, it's not long till you hit something causing you to fall over. You get to your feet and feel the wall, it was slightly soft and stank, you realise where you are. Inside a sock!, suddenly everything was shaking, the owner of the sock you were in must of got up and was now walking somewhere. You were boiling in there as the giant foot started to sweat.

After a while the walking had stopped, everything started to get lighter as the person took off his shoes. "All right in there?!" you instantly recognised the voice, it was one of the Weasly twins, you then heard the second twin talk "He's not responding, better shake him" the first twin shook his socked foot, causing you to fly around inside the sock. "stop please" you pleaded, they didn't hear you though. "let's get him out" you heard the god-size twins say. Everything got lighter, you were finally out of the sock, to your huge relief. After you rubbed your eyes you noticed that you were in the Gryffindor common room and that two giant red heads were staring down at you smiling. "why am I so small?" you tried shouting at them "sorry mate can't hear you.... What is it?" one of them said "I think he said he wants to kiss our feet" the other one said, he smile turned bigger. "we tested our new candy on you, haven't thought of a name for it yet. It shrinks people" the first twin explained. You were dreading thinking of what they were going to do with you. The second twin was thinking of ideas "how about...."
142.title: You wake up to darkness

Come on put more effort Into it the twin bellows at you
Quickly you start to push harder the foul stench invading your nostrils
Suddenly the twin starts to move taking his sock off
You gag at the smell it smelled like he didn't shower for weeks
Seeing you pause the twin places his foot on top of you
No kiss it he says some lint falls on you fearfully you start planting kisses on the big toe
Lick he says now havin the edge over you you start licking and rubbing
A salty taste soon fills your mouth as some lint falls in there as well
He then plants his foot on top of you and forces you between his toes
Then
1421.title: A foot massage?"

151.content:
How about these?
Cedric before his death
151.title: Student

151331.content:
It's just gone midnight, you are bored and cant resist the urge to go explore hogwarts castle. You quickly fling the hufflepuff robes you were given first day on and slowly walk past the sleeping students. You Quickly steal a really hot guys socks you've been trying to smell for ages and continue through the common room doors. You enter into a corridor, leading to the moving staircases. With no real destination you decide to let the staircases mark your path.

It leads you to floor 1 - transfiguration - You carefully open the door, aware of the noise it makes. You heart starts beating faster and faster as you walk down to a large corridor, there is a large statue to your left about 6 feet in front of you. You let out a squeal and quickly hide behind a wall. There was a slytherin prefect sitting on the statue! You completely forgot about them. "Whose there?!" The prefect shouted, his voice was deep and dominant. He stood up and started walking across the corridor. You see him look straight at you and you try to run, but he shoots "Locomotomortis." and you fall to the ground, your last view was a shiny black shoe coming towards your face before you faint.

You slowly open your eyes to a cold floor, a heavy weight is on your back. You try to get up but the weight keeps you down, you manage to roll over though. So your back is now on the floor, you look up to see the slytherin prefect sitting on the statues base - his two shoe-clad feet crossed on you chest - he looked down at you and smiled "Thank you so much for coming, I haven't had a good foot rest in months!" You could now see his face as it looked down at you. He looked slightly Latin whith a slight tan. His two brown eyes only added to his overall dominance. He rubbed one of his shoes on your face, you tried to move a arm to get him off but realised you were immobile. He finished rubbing and some dirt trickled down your face "This is gonna be fun." he smirked and got up. You started to plead "please let me up."
He placed one foot on your chin, and said "I saw the sock in your pocket, your a genuine freak. Aren't ya?"
"what are you going to do?" you said desperately.
"Oh shut up!" he said, in a controlling voice. He quickly sat down on the statue base and ripped off a shoe. You saw his dirty black sock, it had a White imprint of his sole and was covered in holes. "This'll help." he took off the sock and wriggled his toes then he knelt down next to you and wrapped the sock around your mouth, to be used as a sock-gag. You gaved a muffled plea. "Don't worry," he said "you'll get my barefoot soon." the smell was already getting to you. It was much stronger than any other foot you've been at while your fellow hufflepuff's were sleeping. He shove his other foot in your face, this one was still confined to the black shoe. "You're gonna lick it clean. NOW!" He wriggled the massive shoe around your face, it easily covered the entire length of your face and must of been at least a size 12. "Begin," he shouted "Oh, and you'll be calling me master from now on."
151331.title: Slytherin prefect

choices: He calls some more prefects over
1513311.content:
You start licking up and down the sole of the shoe. You had managed to move the gag with your Tongue just enough to be able to please your new master. He sat back down and rested the heel of the shoe in your mouth, you start to suck on it as he starts to speak, "See, this is where you idiot hufflepuff's belong. At your masters feet. What was hufflepuff's attributes again? Loyal, respectful, obedient. Like a dog!"
You stopped licking, and spit the shoe out. "Thats enough!" you say, forgetting your position. Your master looks down at you and gets up, "What?"
"That's-... That's...enough." you whimper and he stands on top of you. "You need to learn your place,SLAVE!" The air inside if you gets forced out as his weight piles on your chest, he then lifts his shoe and playfully dangles it over your face before forcing it down on your face. "Now, what are you."
You hesitate before answering, this only leads to even more weight pilling on you face. "I can crush you, slave. I've done it before."
You quickly start to kiss the sole of the shoe and the weight lifts. "Good." your master says "I think you've had enough of my shoe haven't you? Lift your chin!"
You've learnt by now not to ask questions and lift your chin, he uses you as a shoehorn to rip off his shoe. A wall of sweat instantly hit you and his shoes falls down to your neck. "Have fun." he says and sits down again, this time resting his head on the statue. He rubbed his socked foot across your face. His barefoot was on your chest. You couldn't help but think it was waiting, watching for it's time for your full foot worship.
1513311.title: Continue

152.content: Ok some teachers. Don't get on their bad side...
152.title: Teacher

info.brief_description: Your'e at harry's, or one of his friends feet. Have fun. Please add
info.description:
This only includes male feet
You're a student at hogwarts and also a best friend to one of main characters. One day you finally get what you wanted since coming to Hogwarts : worshipping you're friends feet.
Rules
No sex
No female feet
No sudden endings
No excessive swearing
Other than that have fun making additions or just reading it!.

I do not own harry potter or its characters.
